Posts.Content: hrtofluv wrote: Hi all!  New here.  Found a lump in my right armpit this weekend and got to the doc this morning.  She felt every lymph node (groin, neck, and armpit) and said that only the one lymph node (bottom one) was enlarged.  She did a CBC and a sed rate and called the Breast Center and got me in for Wed morning U/S and Mammogram.  Just curious about the odds of this being something more. THANKS! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Enlarged lymph node axillary hrtofluv HeatherBLocklear
